full_text: ARE YOU FEELING THE PUMPKIN SPICE VIBE? Knit yourself a whole pumpkin patch of happy pumpkins! Difficulty – Novice Knitter Seamless construction (knit in the round) Photo & Video Stitch Guides To Help You Along the way The Teal Pumpkin Project Due to the very real danger that food allergies and sensitivities cause, many children can not participate fully in Halloween trick or treating. Consider offering non-candy items for trick or treaters such as glow sticks, stickers, etc so that all children may join in the fun. Consider knitting your pumpkin in teal to proudly display to alert trick or treaters that it is safe for ALL children to visit your home and join in the fun or knit in orange to show your love for all things fall. Skill Level Approximately 19″ diameter Advanced Beginner Size Approximately 19″ diameter 7″ tall (including the stem) Gauge: 16 stitches / 26 rows = 4″ Needles Size 6 (4mm) Double pointed needles, or 24″ circular (using magic loop for the increases and decreases) Yarn Worsted weight yarn – 20 yrds White (stem & leaf) – 100 yrds Teal (pumpkin) We Recommend: Twice Sheared Sheep Everyday Merino Notions 10 Stitch Markers Row Counter (Recommended) 60g Fiber Fill Stuffing Scissors Darning Needle
name: Ravelry: Teal Pumpkin pattern by Dawn Prickett
